quote: Was Briony the only person who could hear the venom dripping from the woman’s tongue? What good was beauty — a mature beauty, but beauty nonetheless — if it cloaked such a viperous soul?
quote_letters: WAS BRIONY THE ONLY PERSON WHO COULD HEAR THE VENOM DRIPPING FROM THE WOMANS TONGUE WHAT GOOD WAS BEAUTY - A MATURE BEAUTY BUT BEAUTY NONETHELESS - IF IT CLOAKED SUCH A VIPEROUS SOUL
